channel.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Video Podcasts
channel.description: Videos of Maine Ghost Hunters featuring investigations, team documentaries and instructional information sessions.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Mini-Documentaries
channel.itunes:summary:
Maine Ghost Hunters' mini-documentaries are about places we've been, or local areas of interest in our home state of Maine. Many of our Maine-based mini-documentaries are designed to bring the viewer's attention to locations of local lore, legend, and intrigue.
If you know of an area or location of paranormal interest you'd like to see us do a mini-documentary on, please e-mail us at maineghosthunters@maineghosthunters.org
channel.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, paranormal, spirit, haunted, investigation, mini-documentaries, mini-docs
channel.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Hollywood Experience 2010 - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
A mini-documentary on the highlights of our trip out to Los Angeles, California for the filming of a TV show (in the year 2010) we were involved with at the time. Meet some of our clients that made the trip with us, and get a small taste of what it was like to be a member of Maine Ghost Hunters during this exceptionally awesome Hollywood Experience.
Thanks to everyone who made this special gift a memory we'll hang onto for a long time to come. You're all fantastic!
Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Anderson Cemetery - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters investigates the Anderson Cemetery on the River Road in Windham, Maine. Take the tour as we guide you through the grounds in this video documentary about our daytime scout of the haunted Anderson Cemetery.
Join our forum at www.maineghosthunters.org to discuss this and other Maine Paranormal topics.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Anderson Cemetery - Mini-Documentary

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - 5 Stones Brunswick, ME - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters spent the afternoon hunting down these supposed "haunted" stones. We had to see for ourselves what the Internet rumor regarding these rocks is really all about. Turns out, fiction might be more fascinating than fact, in this case. Take a look, and form your own opinion about the matter.
Join us at our forum to discuss this video and topic, as well as other Maine Paranormal subjects. You can find us online at www.maineghosthunters.net.

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Devil's Footprint - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters does a daytime documentary on the local legend of The Devil's Footprint. Join us as we delve into the rumors, stories, and legend of this favorite legend-tripping spot for area high school students and thrill seekers alike.
Discuss your opinions and views of The Devil's Footprint in our forum at www.maineghosthunters.net . There's plenty of Maine paranormal chat waiting to be discovered!

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - North Cemetery Witch's Grave - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters documents the location of the local legend; "cemetery in the pit" otherwise known by it's formal name "North Cemetery". Join us as we video document the history of this local legend and show you some of the physical aspects of this location.
Join the Maine Ghost Hunters forum at www.maineghosthunters.net for more Paranormal Maine chat and discussion.

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Randolph Woods - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters Tony and Kat take a day trip back to the Randolph Woods to discuss their past investigations of this location. The Randolph Woods has been rumored to be one of the most haunted places in Maine, so we definitely invite you to view this video documentary on the location to see what Kat and Tony found there.
Join the MaineGhostHunters at our forum located at www.maineghosthunters.net for more Maine Paranormal topics!
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Randolph Woods - Mini-Documentary

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Spider Gates Cemetery Leicester, MA - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters took a day trip to Leicester, Massachusetts to see what all the fuss is about surrounding this little cemetery thrill seekers call Spidergates.
Disclaimer: If you are planning a visit to the beautiful little Friends-Meetinghouse Cemetery in Leicester, MA please be aware of a few things. 1. It is not a creepy or scary location. It is very beautiful, immaculate in every sense, and obviously maintained with care and concern. 2. It is sometimes called the 8th gate to hell or 8 gates to hell. This cemetery has 1, and only 1, set of gates, not 8 as rumor and legend purports. 3. The limb on the "hanging tree" is so high you'd need a ladder to get to it. It's doubtful a grown adult, let alone a small child, could reach such heights. 4. The grounds are no longer being used for new burials because the area is so haunted - is NOT true at all. There have been burials here up until very recently - 2008
5. The most important point: Most of the paranormal activity in the past has been reported on the road, which continues on past the cemetery, NOT in the cemetery itself.
When visiting this location please be on your best behavior and approach this location with the utmost respect. Families are still burying their loved ones here, and this place has not been forgotten or abandoned. It is still maintained and kept up on an obviously regular and routine basis. It is not, at all, a cursed place to be legend tripped or visited at night for a cheap thrill. All you're likely to get from a PM experience is a nice long walk on an old road out in the woods. Nothing more, nothing less.
Join us at www.maineghosthunters.net for this topic and other paranormal discussion.

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Western Cemetery - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters does a daytime scout of the Western Cemetery in Portland, Maine. The Western Cemetery is Portland's 2nd oldest cemetery and has gone through quite a few rough times and equally rough transitions. Join Maine Ghost Hunters as we take you through an informal and casual tour of the grounds during this short documentary.
Please feel free to join our Maine Ghost Hunters.net forum located at www.maineghosthunters.net to discuss this and other Maine Paranormal topics.

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Western Cemetery Part 2 - Mini-Documentary
item.description:
Join Maine Ghost Hunters as we tour Portland, Maine's Western Cemetery again with our video camera. This trip was dedicated toward the effort of recording EVP's but we also offer a bit more information on the history of the burial grounds and the environmental issues a paranormal investigator may have to content with while attempting an EVP session in the day time.
Join our forum at www.maineghosthunters.net to talk about this and other Maine Paranormal topics.
